EXTRA_SPACE: Color name contains leading, trailing, or excessive spaces. Please remove unnecessary spaces.
MERGED_WORDS: Color name contains merged words without proper spacing. Please add appropriate spaces between distinct words.
RANDOM_TEXT_NOISE: Color name contains random characters or noise that makes it difficult to understand. Please remove invalid characters.
INVALID_FORMAT: Color name uses incorrect separator format. Please use '/' instead of '-' when combining colors.
MISSING_VALUE: Color name is missing. Please provide a valid color name.
INVALID_TYPE: Color name must be a text string. Please provide a valid color name as text.
